properties.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
properties.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 10 at 11:51AM AKST until February 11 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks, AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. The cold wind chills
will cause frostbite in as little as 10 minutes to exposed
skin. Expect wind chills to range from 25 below zero to 40
below zero.

* WHERE...St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast.

* WHEN...Now to noon Tuesday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Cold wind chills as low as 40 below zero
will cause frostbite in as little as 10 minutes to exposed skin.
properties.instruction:
A Wind Chill Advisory means that cold air and sustained wind
speeds of 15 mph or more will create low wind chills. Frost bite
and hypothermia can occur if precautions are not taken.

NWSheadline: WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST TUESDAY
